description: This source file contains the implementation of a function to create a Bmc2ComeoReaderComponent object, along with license headers and descriptive comments. It is part of the BMC2 module, related to Broadway Management Console, and provides the factory function for object instantiation.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CreateBmc2ComeoReaderComponent(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of the Bmc2ComeoReaderComponent object, taking context handles as parameters.
